SEARCH
Package Utils

Class SoundPlayer

java.lang.Object
Utils.SoundPlayer
public class SoundPlayer extends Object
Utility class responsible for managing and playing sound effects and ambient music in the game. It uses the javax.sound.sampled library to handle audio clips.

    • playCaveAmbience

      public static void playCaveAmbience()
      Starts playing the cave ambience sound in a continuous loop. If the ambience is already playing, this method does nothing.

    • stopCaveAmbience

      public static void stopCaveAmbience()
      Stops the cave ambience sound if it is currently playing and releases resources.

    • playSound

      public static void playSound(String filePath)
      Plays a sound from the specified file path. This method handles the low-level audio system operations.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the audio file (.wav) to be played
